sources.title: A Coming-Out Party
sources.description: Title: A Coming-Out Party Summary: A somewhat happy-go-lucky bunch of Brits in a German POW camp find their new acerbic fellow prisoner is a key officer who must be got out at all cost. Directed by: Ken Annakin Actors: James Robertson Justice, Leslie Phillips, Stanley Baxter Production Company: Independent Artists Release Date: 11 September 1961 (Sweden) Aspect Ratio: 1.66 : 1 A somewhat happy-go-lucky bunch of Brits in a German POW camp find their new acerbic fellow prisoner is a key officer who must be got out at all cost.

metadata.Plot: A somewhat happy-go-lucky bunch of Brits in a German POW camp find their new acerbic fellow prisoner is a key officer who must be got out at all cost.
